name: Game-Bonk
description:
Bonk-A-Console™️

Go around and bonk away before they get you instead!

Get ready for a super janky wave-based game that's hopefully at least a little bit fun 🤩 

 Controls: 
  • mouse: move camera 
  • mouse-left click - attack (aims at crosshair in center of screen)
  • WASD - character movement
  • Shift - Run
  • F - interact with/purchase rewards from chests
  • space - jump
Theme: Break The System

break the game systems around you and survive in this caged up world. Bonk them with your club to get gold - use the gold to purchase powerups and become stronger & faster. Survive unlimited waves and attempt to get a high score! 

while you are here...

Check out my Youtube Channel for gamedev & tutorials
Or my twitter @drowsyfoxgames
